scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development env-cmd .env nodemon server.js --config nodemon.js
scripts.test:unit:local: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --report-dir=reports/nyc mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.opts app_api/movil/test/unit/*.test.js --exit
scripts.test:unit:local:watch: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.travis.opts app_api/movil/test/*.unit.test.js  --watch --recursive
scripts.test:unit:travis: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.travis.opts app_api/movil/test/*.test.js --exit
scripts.test:integration:local: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --report-dir=reports/nyc mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.opts app_api/movil/test/*.test.js --exit
scripts.test:integration:local:watch: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.travis.opts app_api/movil/test/*.integration.test.js  --watch --recursive
scripts.test:integration:travis: yarn cross-env NODE_ENV=testing env-cmd .env mocha --opts app_api/movil/test/mocha.travis.opts app_api/movil/test/*.test.js --exit
